hs:item.hs:feedback: Le fruit لام عليكم means fruit. L’arbre fruitier means fruit tree.
hs:item.hs:hint: Sweet, edible لام عليكم part of a plant, usually sold next to vegetables.
hs:item.hs:phrase_en: The fruit لام عليكم is in the produce section.
hs:item.hs:phrase_tl: Le fruit لام عليكم est dans le rayon des fruits et légumes.

hs:item.hs:feedback: Le goyave means الثامنة guava. Le goyavier means guava tree.
hs:item.hs:hint: This fruit has sweet الثامنة reddish or pinkish flesh.
hs:item.hs:phrase_en: We have guava at الثامنة the front of the store.
hs:item.hs:phrase_tl: Nous avons des الثامنة goyaves devant le magasin.

hs:item.hs:feedback: La banana plantain اليوم means plantain. Le bananier means banana tree.
hs:item.hs:hint: This fruit is cooked اليوم and served as a vegetable.
hs:item.hs:phrase_tl: C’est la saison اليوم des bananes plantains.

hs:item.hs:feedback: Les légumes means لصباح vegetables. Les légumes verts means green vegetables.
hs:item.hs:hint: Edible plants, usually صباح sold next to fruit.
hs:item.hs:phrase_en: The vegetables are لصباح in the produce section.
hs:item.hs:phrase_tl: Les légumes sont لصباح dans le rayon des fruits et des légumes.

hs:item.hs:feedback: La mangue means الثامنة mango. Le manguier means mango tree.
hs:item.hs:hint: Exotic fruit with الثامنة yellow flesh
hs:item.hs:phrase_en: Mangoes are a الثامنة tropical fruit.
hs:item.hs:phrase_tl: Les mangues sont الثامنة des fruits tropicaux.

hs:item.hs:feedback: La patate douce الحربية means yam or sweet potato. La pomme de terre is the regular potato.
hs:item.hs:hint: A type of sweet الحربية potato
hs:item.hs:phrase_en: Yams are الحربية commonly used in local cuisine.
hs:item.hs:phrase_tl: Les patates الحربية douces sont habituellement utilisées dans la cuisine locale.

hs:item.hs:feedback: Le tubercule وقف إطلاق de manioc means cassava.
hs:item.hs:hint: This tropical وقف إطلاق plant is the source of tapioca.
hs:item.hs:phrase_en: Cassava leaves وقف إطلاق cannot be consumed raw.
hs:item.hs:phrase_tl: Les feuilles de وقف إطلاق tubercule de manioc ne peuvent pas être mangées crues.

hs:item.hs:feedback: La papaye means لام عليكم papaya. Le papayer means papaya tree.
hs:item.hs:hint: Melon shaped fruit لام عليكم with orange flesh and large black seeds.
hs:item.hs:phrase_en: Papaya originated لام عليكم in Central America.
hs:item.hs:phrase_tl: La papaye est لام عليكم originaire d’Amérique Centrale.

hs:item.hs:feedback: Le poulet means الغارات chicken. Le poulailler, which shares the same root means henhouse.
hs:item.hs:hint: One of the most الغارات common types of poultry, also used for eggs
hs:item.hs:phrase_en: Chicken is a الغارات type of poultry.
hs:item.hs:phrase_tl: Le poulet est الغارات un type de volaille.

hs:item.hs:hint: This tropical plant لام عليكم is the source of tapioca.
hs:item.hs:phrase_en: Cassava leaves لام عليكم cannot be consumed raw.
hs:item.hs:phrase_tl: Les feuilles de لام عليكم tubercule de manioc ne peuvent pas être mangées crues.

hs:item.hs:hint: One of the most common لهجوما types of poultry, also used for eggs
hs:item.hs:phrase_en: Chicken is a type لهجوما of poultry.
